settings.heading: Key Features
settings.content:
• Segmental Mastery: Train specific vertebral levels, improving strength and control for optimal spinal wellness.
  • Instant Feedback: Benefit from immediate auditory, tactile, and visual feedback during spinal exercises, pinpointing areas that require attention and refinement.
  • Greater Mobility: Identify and address limitations in spinal mobility, leading to increased flexibility and a broader range of motion.
  • Universal Design: Suitable for users of all ages and fitness backgrounds, including injury recovery, postural improvement, and athletic performance enhancement.
  • User-friendly: Seamlessly integrate the SEG-B®️ into your daily routine and workout plan with its intuitive and easy-to-use design.


Invest in your spinal health and unlock your body's full potential with the Backsync SEG-B®️. Experience the difference and join the movement revolution today!

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
For a limited time, we are offering Free Shipping on all Domestic orders. All orders are processed and fulfilled within three business days.

We want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. Therefore, All Items can be returned or exchanged for free within 30 days of delivery.

settings.heading: The world's first spinal segmentation training device
settings.subheading: Empower yourself with the SEG-B® to optimize spinal health and enhance your daily performance. Experience the freedom of a mobile, pain-free life. Start your transformation now!

settings.heading: Dr. Mike, MoveU
settings.subheading: "An amazing product that we’ve been using for a while that helps you learn to segmentally control your spine! When you can articulate segments of the spine, it helps create body control and stabilization. It helps develop awareness between core and spine. It helps you keep the spine mobile. Ultimately you want to maintain a neutral curve to your spine most of the time. This helps you with balance and stability."
